Getting Started¶

You will need to get API keys for both Riot Games’ API and Champion.gg’s API and store them in a file called keys.py. After obtaining the API keys, the scripts in surrender20/development/src/data should be run in the following order:

  1. surrender20/development/src/data/get_matches.py
  2. surrender20/development/src/data/get_past_riot.py
  3. surrender20/development/src/data/get_cgg.py

These scripts will produce the training data needed to use the rest of the surrender20 package and store the data in surrender20/development/data directory.

Note: The champion statistics from Champion.gg will update every patch, so the timestamp in get_matches.py must also be updated with the time of the newest patch release.

Note: The Riot Games’ API key expires 24 hours after activation. Make sure to update daily!
